name: blueumbrella
tagline: The UK’s Leading Virtual Assistant Business
description: blueumbrella are an expert team of virtual personal assistants (VAs) with years of board level PA experience and expertise. We know your business is unique and that sometimes you need an extra pair of hands to help you along the way. That’s where blueumbrella virtual assistants come in. Through our unique approach we learn exactly how you and your business work and how we can help you operate at peak productivity.

locations.address: Exchange at Somerset House South Wing Strand
